transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Happy Green Snugglefin Murloc Hood

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 904,273 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 332,975.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Green Snugglefin Murloc Mittens

spells.description: Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 3.8 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 1.9 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Green Snugglefin Murloc Backpack

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
